about_the_game:
It is an innovative experience game based on VR technology. In this game, players can enter a scientific and technological table tennis court through VR header, and perform a different table tennis duel with the robotic arm.

game instructions:

Players need to wear VR headset equipment and hold the handle in their hands. With the game, players will be brought into a ping -ping court full of future sense, which is full of high -tech elements in the scene. At the other end of the court, players will face a high -intelligent robotic arm, which will be your opponent.



The gameplay is very simple. Players only need to use the buttons in the handle to control their position and the direction of hitting the ball, and play table tennis games with the robotic arm. You only need to win more than the sparring robotic arm within the specified time to win. In the game, the robotic arm will continue to launch table tennis. Players need to quickly respond and accurately control the virtual racket to hit the ball back to the opponent's venue. Do not let the table tennis fall to the ground when your venue is as possible.
In the game, players can experience the real hitting feeling, and the speed and direction of each ball will affect the results of the game. This can not only improve the player's coordination ability, but also exercise the muscles of the wrist and arms.



The game also provides players with additional cheering service. There is a beautiful woman next to it to cheer you up, encourage you to do your best in the game and do your best.
This is a game full of technology and innovation, allowing players to experience real table tennis games in the virtual world. If you like sports and technology, try this game.

Game operation:

Complete the hitting action by waving the right handle
